result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lanie L Rodewald

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lanie L Rodewald in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CM301, 15CM345.
Plea questionnaire and Waiver of Rights presented.  Court questions defendant.
15CM301:  Defendant pleads Guilty to Count 1 and Count 2.  Court accepts and finds Guilty to Count 1 and Count 2.
State relates recommendation.
Attorney Hinde relates recommendation.
Defendant addresses Court.

Court relates and orders: 15CM301
Count 1:
Jail: 30 days with huber - Stayed. 
Probation: 1 year.
Must complete Anger Management assesment and follow-up treatment recommended.
AODA and comply with recommended follow-up treatment.
Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent.
Must have no contact with Samantha Rich except as authorized by Probation.
DNA sample.
Court Costs.

Count 2:
Jail: 30 days with huber, consecutive to Count 1. - Stayed
Probation: 1 year Concurrent with Count 1.
Court Costs

15CM345:  Court orders Count 1 and Count 2 - DRI.

Must report to Probation by 3:00 p.m. on 11-20-2015.
Must report to jail for DNA sample Thursday 11-19-2015 between 1:00-5:00 p.m.

Jury Trial to be cancelled.

(clerked by AP)
Defendant Lanie L Rodewald in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CM301, 15CM345, AND 14TR917

No agreement yet.
15CM301:Jury trial set for 12/09/15 as back-up
Final plea date set
15CM345:  To go back to Judge Babler for scheduling.
Bond(s) to continue.
OTSC on 14TR917.  Reset to 10/14/2015 at 10 AM.  $50.00 monthly Court ordered.  Wage Assignment - Henry Rifle.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 18, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Lanie L Rodewald
Current: 2136 20 1/8 Ave Lot 13, Rice Lake, WI 54868 United States  (Effective: 09-24-2015)
Prior: 1971 16 1/2 Ave. # 47, Cameron, WI 54822

(clerked by WH)
Defendant Lanie L Rodewald in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS ALSO COVERS  15CM345  Plea hearing scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.
Must have no contact with Samantha R. or her child.
$100.00 CASH BOND TO BE POSTED BY 4:00 P.M. ON FRIDAY, AUGUST 7, 2015.

Defendant Lanie L Rodewald in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Defendant Lanie L Rodewald in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant pleads NG.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
